CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: M and C are looking in house
M begins taking toys out of house
C quickly thrusts bed in the house
C puts his hand in a room; pushes door to house open
M closes door after C moves his hand
C moves some toys; finds car; makes a lot of noise
some toy must have hurt M somehow
C picks up tray for dishes
M moves something out of house
M taps table at which they are sitting
M drpped something; she picks it up
C moves a book near M; holds his own book
C turns some pages of his book
C hands his book to M
it is the CareBear feelings book
no response from C; sits and stares woodenly
M moves finger to another picture
M searches opposite picture; turns page
M turns pages of book; closes book
